dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, B, did you catch the news about President Tokayev this week?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, B, did you catch the news about President Tokayev this week?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, uh, yeah, I think I saw a headline flash by. What was the gist of it again?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, uh, yeah, I think I saw a headline flash by. What was the gist of it again?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He sent a really significant congratulatory telegram. Like, a big one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He sent a really significant congratulatory telegram. Like, a big one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev sent a congratulatory telegram to President of Mozambique Filipe Nyusi, according to a statement from Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, to whom, though? I’m totally blanking on that part.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, to whom, though? I'm totally blanking on that part.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: To President Filipe Nyusi of Mozambique. They're celebrating their 50th anniversary of independence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To President Filipe Nyusi of Mozambique. They're celebrating their fiftieth anniversary of independence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev sent a congratulatory telegram to President of Mozambique Filipe Nyusi... The President of Kazakhstan congratulated Filipe Nyusi and the people of Mozambique on the 50th anniversary of the country™s independence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Fifty years, wow. That's, um, a huge milestone, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fifty years, wow. That's, um, a huge milestone, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And Tokayev really emphasized that. He called it a 'historic day' and a 'vivid symbol of unity and progress.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And Tokayev really emphasized that. He called it a historic day and a vivid symbol of unity and progress.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "This historic day holds special significance as a vivid symbol of your nation™s unity and progress, a solid foundation of statehood and sustainable development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. So, uh, more than just a quick 'happy anniversary' then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. So, uh, more than just a quick happy anniversary then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Much more. He also mentioned it being a 'solid foundation of statehood and sustainable development.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Much more. He also mentioned it being a solid foundation of statehood and sustainable development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "This historic day holds special significance as a vivid symbol of your nation™s unity and progress, a solid foundation of statehood and sustainable development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's quite profound for a telegram. I mean, usually they're pretty brief, no?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's quite profound for a telegram. I mean, usually they're pretty brief, no?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but this one, it was quite detailed. He wished them 'great achievements in the name of independence.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but this one, it was quite detailed. He wished them great achievements in the name of independence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I wish your country great achievements in the name of independence," the telegram reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And, um, what about the relationship between the two countries? Did he touch on that at all?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, um, what about the relationship between the two countries? Did he touch on that at all?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He did! [interrupts] Yeah, he expressed confidence that the friendly relations between Kazakhstan and Mozambique will continue to develop.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did! Yeah, he expressed confidence that the friendly relations between Kazakhstan and Mozambique will continue to develop.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Tokayev also expressed confidence that friendly relations between Kazakhstan and Mozambique will continue to develop.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Oh, that's good to hear. It's always nice when leaders, like, reach out like that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's good to hear. It's always nice when leaders, like, reach out like that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. A good sign for international cooperation, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. A good sign for international cooperation, I think.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Agreed. Shows a lot of, uh, goodwill.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Agreed. Shows a lot of, uh, goodwill.
